title: wire:click
description: Livewire provides a simple wire:click directive for calling component methods (aka actions) when a user clicks a specific element on the page.

sections.title: #Using wire:click on links
sections.content: When using wire:click on <a> tags, you must append .prevent to prevent the default handling of a link in the browser. Otherwise, the browser will visit the provided link and update the page's URL.

sections.title: #Going deeper
sections.content: The wire:click directive is just one of many different available event listeners in Livewire. For full documentation on its (and other event listeners) capabilities, visit the Livewire actions documentation page.
